title: Comeback Queens Ferrand-Prévot, Van der Breggen Face Toughest Challenge Yet at Strade Bianche
content:
How will returning superstars Ferrand-Prévot and Van der Breggen stand up against the WorldTour best in one of the season's hardest races?

Read the full article at Comeback Queens Ferrand-Prévot, Van der Breggen Face Toughest Challenge Yet at Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: ahood
